sobre.texto: QA professional focused on test automation, software quality and continuous improvement. Experience with CI/CD pipelines, E2E testing and API testing.

responsabilidades: I integrate QA practices into agile processes (Scrum/Kanban) with a focus on continuous improvement
I conduct manual and automated tests, ensuring functional coverage and system stability
I create and document clear and objective test cases
Visual Studio Code – Development and versioning of scripts
I perform exploratory and regression testing to identify issues early
I log, track and collaborate on resolving defects using incident management tools
Software Testing - In the fleet management system, when new features were released. Performing manual tests.
In my role, some tasks were repetitive, so I automated them using Python and Selenium.
Managed a B2B customer portfolio, ensuring engagement and continuous success with the solutions offered.
Held strategic meetings with stakeholders to analyze performance, KPIs and align objectives.
Analyzed platform usage data and indicators, proposing improvements based on strategic insights.
Developed customized training to empower end users.

squads.descricao: Defined acceptance criteria, wrote BDD scenarios and automated critical E2E flows, integrating the suite into the CI pipeline.
Conducted exploratory manual tests and regression automation with Selenium, collaborating with devs to reduce production bugs.
